entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:43 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 03:45 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 03:18 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
